short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the current number of new (unread) posts in the Google+ stream on the favicon of the Google+ tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep an eye on the Google+ stream and never miss another breaking news in again, even while browsing in other tabs.

v0.0.20: added new icon
